transcription.text: Finnish Prime Minister Sanna Marin has faced intense media scrutiny and criticism from political opponents since footage of her dancing with friends was leaked on social media. In defiance of the fuss, women in Finland have been sharing videos of themselves partying in solidarity, creating a viral groundswell of support for the world’s youngest head of state. Marin has defended herself publicly against speculation that dancing and drinking in private undermines her professional position. The positive response and support on Twitter and TikTok has effectively turned a negative social media experience – having the video leaked – into one of empowerment.
